name: E.T.C. Sentry
description:
Explosiventure Trading Company presents the Sentry.
** 7 5/8" over all length, 3 1/2" blade. Finished walnut scales with brass pins and a re-purposed leather sheath.**

Hand made from tough tempered steel for a simple, effective design. The perfect companion, whether manning the watch post or investigating suspicious activity. We would know, we've been there.

name: Barbarian Survivor Cuff
description:
A survival bracelet to outperform the rest. In the Barbarian Survivor is neatly fit a tough tool steel knife; a P-38 military style can opener; a stainless steel inspirational dog tag; at least 12 feet of 550 lb test parachute cord. All of this fit onto a comfortable and durable wrist cuff and secured with a side release buckle.

Select the size you want the bracelet to be. I suggest a little larger than your wrist for a comfortable fit.

The P-38 and knife are both easily and quickly usable without having to disassemble your cuff.

The inscription on the dog tag reads "Drop your torch and fear not the darkness". Custom dog tags are available. Please contact me for more information on personalized inscriptions.

If you do find yourself in a bad situation, and the parachute cord is needed, simply cut the melted section off and unravel. You'll notice the knife has notches on the base. These allow secure lashing to a handle if you ever need to disassemble the bracelet. Doing this makes the knife much easier to use when you need it most.

Each bracelet is made to order and high standards. Please allow 3 - 5 business days to ship.

name: Custom Dogtag
description:
***Message me before buying a custom tag. I want to be sure I understand what you want before it's payed for. Select the "custom tag" with the Barbarian Survivor Cuff for a personalized tag on your cuff***

Customize a dog tag. Select between a customized quote or the Explosiventure Trading Company quote, "DROP YOUR TORCH AND FEAR NOT THE DARKNESS".

Dog tag allows five lines with 14 characters in each line, spaces count as a character. I will center the quote for an even look unless asked other wise. Message me with questions, I will happily and quickly provide you with an answer.

If you are purchasing a Barbarian Survivor Cuff with the default quote, "Drop your torch and fear not the darkness." you do not need to purchase this in addition. This is for a tag by its self or a custom tag on the cuff.
